inviteForm.cantUpdateAcceptedInvite: You cannot edit invite if it has been already accepted by a Service user, translation or guest.
inviteForm.patientTeleConsultationDescription: Send an invitation link to a Service user to conduct a session. You can also send an invitation to an Interpreter, Family member or Other caregiver
inviteForm.thirdPartyConsultation: Service user in person - Invitation to a third party
inviteForm.thirdPartyConsultationDescription: The Service user is in a face-to-face consultation. Send an invitation link to an Interpreter, Family member or Other caregiver
inviteForm.consultationWillBeOnPremise: The session will be carried out with the Service user in person.
inviteForm.sendLinkManually: I want to send the link manually
inviteForm.pleaseOnlyFillUpAnEmailOrAnMobilePhoneNu: Please enter an email or mobile number with the country code (for example +252, +41, +380)

inviteForm.pleaseOnlyFillUpAnEmailOrAnMobilePhoneNu: Please fill in only one email or mobile number.
inviteForm.warningTranslatorMightBeLate: The interpreter may respond from a less suitable location if the request is made less than 24 hours in advance.
inviteForm.notPermitted: This phone number is not permitted to be used on this platform.
inviteForm.inviteLovedOneOrProfessional: Invite a loved one or another caregiver
inviteForm.patientInvitationWillBeAfterTranslatorIs: No invitation will be sent to the Service user or relatives until an interpreter has validated the invitation.
inviteForm.atLeastInviteGuestOrTranslator: You must invite at least a third party. To invite an interpreter, please change the Service user's language.

overlay.theConsultationWillBeDisplayedIntoHistor: The session will be displayed into history during 24 hours and you will not be able to communication anymore
overlay.youWillbeAbleToResumeTheConsultationLate: You will be able to resume the session later but the Service user will not able to communite with you anymore.

overlay.doYouWantToLeaveUsAComment: Do you want to leave us a comment?

invitations.confirmRevoke: Are you sure you want to revoke and delete this invitation? No message will be sent to the Service user.

resetPassword.theBothPasswordAreNotTheSame: The both password are not the same

resetPassword.anUnknownErrorHasBeenEncountered: An unknown error has been encountered. Please try again.

support.thisFormAllowsYouToReportAProblem: This form allows you to report a problem encountered while using @{{branding}} . Before reporting an incident, please verify that you are using @{{branding}}  under the best possible conditions:
support.yourBrowserIsUpToDate: Your browser is up to date.
support.youTriedThePageTestAudioSound: You tried the page Test audio/sound order to attempt to help yourself.
support.pleaseFillUpThisForm: Please fill up this form from the computer you use the application @{{branding}} . Order to help us in the diagnostic, your IP adress, the name and the version of your browser will be reported.
support.plsProvideDetailsAboutTheProblems: Please provide details about the problem encountered, by exemple "pushing the call button from a session returned no action."
support.whatWasYouDoing: What was you doing before the issue?
support.plsProvideDetailsOfWhat: Please provide details of what you was doing before you encountered the problem, by example "I was into the session in order to send text messages".
support.theFollowingInformation: The following information we will reported

testMedia.aProperlyTuned: A properly tuned microphone should put the VU meter in the green center area when speaking.
